nodes.text: In 15 BBY, a pair of Lutki negotiated to buy several Roonstones from Mungo Baobab on the planet Roon.

In the Star Wars: Droids episode "Across the Roon Sea", Mungo Baobab meets with two aliens of different species to negotiate the sale of a number of Roonstones. Baobab's droid C-3PO uses the word "Lutki" to refer to the pair but the exact meaning is unclear.
